ugath padam ha prathisandhana komishan sabhawe nirdesha kriyawata nanwima pahasu kirima sandaha prathisandhanaya sandaha wana wishesha karyanshayak pihituwimata rajaya thiranaya karayi.meki komishan sabhawe nirdesha kriyathmaka kirima wimarshanaya kirime kamituwata pahasukam salasima sandaha janadhipathi lekamwarayage yatathe meki wishesha karyanshaya pihituwanu labe.janadhipathi mahinda rajapaksha mahatha me sambandhayen idiripath karana lada kabinat pathrikawata amathi mandala anumathiya labi thibe.ugath padam ha prathisandhana komishan sabhawe nirdesha kriyathmaka kirima sambandhayen janadhipathi lekamwarayage pradhanathwayen yuth kamituwak wisin wimarshanayak sidukara thibena athara, ee anuwa komisame nirdesha 144n 45k sampurna kota athi athara, 89ka katayuthu sidukeremin pawathi.
